column1: Public and Secret Objectives
Public Objectives
column4: Secret Objectives

column1: Stage I 1 VP
column2: Stage II 2 VP
column4: 1 VP each (maximum 3 scored + in hand)

column1: Erect a Monument: Status Phase Spend 8 resources.
column2: Found a Golden Age: Status Phase Spend 16 resources.
column4: Unveil Flagship: Action Phase Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.
column5: Adapt New Strategies: Status Phase  Own 2 faction technologies. "Valefar Assimilator" technologies do not count toward this objective.

column1: Sway the Council: Status Phase Spend 8 influence.
column2: Manipulate Galactic Law: Status Phase Spend 16 influence.
column4: Turn their Fleets to Dust: Action Phase Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.
column5: Master the Laws of Physics: Status Phase Own 4 technologies of the same color.

column1: Negociate Trade Routes: Status Phase Spend 5 trade goods.
column2: Centralize Galactic Trade: Status Phase Spend 10 trade goods.
column4: Destroy their Greatest Ship: Action Phase Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.
column5: Form a Spy Network: Status Phase Discard 5 action cards.

column1: Lead from the Front: Status Phase Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.
column2: Galvanize the People: Status Phase Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.
column4: Spark a Rebellion: Action Phase Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.
column5: Gather a Mighty Fleet: Status Phase Have 5 dreadnoughts on the board.

column1: Diversify Research: Status Phase Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.
column2: Master of Sciences: Status Phase Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.
column4: Threaten Enemies: Status Phase Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.
column5: Establish a Perimeter: Status Phase Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

column1: Develop Weaponry: Status Phase Own 2 unit upgrade technologies.
column2: Revolutionize Warfare: Status Phase Own 3 unit upgrade technologies.
column4: Make an Example of their World: Action Phase Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.
column5: Fuel the War Machine: Status Phase Have 3 space docks on the game board.

column1: Found Research Outposts Status Phase Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.
column2: Form Galactic Brain Trust: Status Phase Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.
column4: Cut Supply Lines: Status Phase Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.
column5: Become the Gatekeeper: Status Phase Have one or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.

column1: Intimidate the Council: Status Phase Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mexatol Rex's system.
column2: Conquer the Weak: Status Phase Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.
column4: Monopolize PRODUCTION: Status Phase Control 4 industrial planets.
column5: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos: Status Phase Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

column1: Expand Borders: Status Phase Control 6 planets in non-home systems.
column2: Subdue the Galaxy: Status Phase Control 11 planets in non-home systems.
column4: Mine Rare Minerals: Status Phase Control 4 hazardous planets.
column5: Control the Region: Status Phase Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

column1: Corner the Market: Status Phase Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.
column2: Unify the Colonies: Status Phase Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.
column4: Forge an Alliance: Status Phase Control 4 cultural planets.
column5: Occupy the Seat of the Empire: Status Phase Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

column1: Amass Wealth: Status Phase Spend 3 influence, 3 resources and 3 trade goods
column2: Hold Vast Reserves: Status Phase Spend 6 influence, 6 resources, and 6 trade goods.
column4: Become a Martyr: Action Phase Lose control of a planet in a home system.
column5: Fight With Precision Action Phase Use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

column1: Build Defenses: Status Phase Have 4 or more structures
column2: Construct Massive Cities: Status Phase Have 7 or more structures.
column4: Betray a Friend: Action Phase Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.
column5: Foster Cohesion Status Phase Be neighbors with all other players.

column1: Discover Lost Outposts: Status Phase Control 2 planets that have attachments
column2: Reclaim Ancient Monuments: Status Phase Control 3 planets that have attachments.
column4: Brave the Void: Action Phase Win a combat in an anomaly.
column5: Hoard Raw Materials: Status Phase Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

column1: Engineer a Marvel: Status Phase Have your flagship or a warsun on the board
column2: Achieve Supremacy: Status Phase Have your flagship or war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.
column4: Darken the Skies: Action Phase Win a combat in another player's home system.
column5: Mechanize the Military: Status Phase Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

column1: Explore Deep Space: Status Phase Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets
column2: Patrol Vast Territories: Status Phase Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.
column4: Defy Space and Time: Status Phase Have units in the wormhole nexus.
column5: Occupy the Fringe: Status Phase Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

column1: Improve Infrastructure: Status Phase Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system
column2: Protect The Border: Status Phase Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.
column4: Demonstrate your Power: Action Phase Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.
column5: Produce en Masse: Status Phase Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 8 in a single system.

column1: Make History: Status Phase Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex or anomalies
column2: Become a Legend: Status Phase Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.
column4: Destroy Heretical Works: Status Phase Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.
column5: Prove Endurance: Action Phase Be the last player to pass during a game round.

column1: Populate the Outer Rim: Status Phase Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system
column2: Control the Borderlands: Status Phase Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.
column4: Dictate Policy: Agenda Phase There are 3 or more laws in play.
column5: Seize an Icon: Status Phase Control a legendary planet.

column1: Push Boundaries: Status Phase Control more planets than each of your neighbors
column2: Rule Distant Lands: Status Phase Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.
column4: Drive the Debate: Agenda Phase You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.
column5: Stake Your Claim: Status Phase Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

column1: Raise a Fleet: Status Phase Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system
column2: Command an Armada: Status Phase Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.
column4: Establish Hegemony: Status Phase Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.
column5: Strengthen Bonds: Status Phase Have another player's promissory note in your play area.
